Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

Inventory_Move_Data.description: Reference to an existing Inventory Site.  Assigns the Site for the transaction and derives the Company.

Inventory_Move_Data.description: References the location that inventory is being moved from (source inventory location).

validation.validation: Enter a 'From Location' that belongs to the specified Inventory Site.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: References the stocking unit of measure of the item being moved.

validation.validation: Unit of measure [uom] is not valid for item [item].

Unit_of_MeasureObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Unit_of_MeasureObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Unit_of_MeasureObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: When the task is Submit Inventory Move Units of Measure Request then this field references the 'To' Unit of Measure which cannot be the same as Unit of Measure.  When the task is Submit Inventory Move Request then the 'To' Unit of Measure should be left blank or must be the same as the Unit of Measure Reference.

validation.validation: When the task is Submit Inventory Move Request then the 'To' Unit of Measure should be left blank or must be the same as the Unit of Measure Reference.
The 'To' Unit of Measure cannot be the same as the 'From' Unit of Measure.
To Unit of Measure is required.

Resource_ProviderObjectID.type: WID,  Contingent_Worker_ID,  External_Sourceable_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_Reference_ID,  Supplier_ID,  Supplier_Reference_ID
Resource_ProviderObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Resource_ProviderObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: Supplier of the consigned goods. Supplier is required when moving quantity out of a consigned location.

validation.validation: The Supplier cannot be provided when the From Location is not consigned.
validation.description: The Supplier cannot be provided when the From Location is not consigned.

validation.validation: A valid Supplier with quantity in the From location is required when goods are moved from a consigned location.
validation.description: A valid Supplier with quantity in the From location is required when goods are moved from a consigned location.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: Reference to the Item Lot ID

validation.validation: A lot id can't be assigned to an item which is not lot-controlled.
The Lot ID is required for lot-controlled items.

validation.validation: The count of serial numbers entered does not match the quantity.
When the task is Submit Inventory Unit of Measure Conversion Request then the Serial Numbers are not allowed.
Serial number(s) [number] currently exists on another picking list.
This set of serial number(s) ([Wrong Item Serials]) is not located at [Currently Selected Location] [Currently Selected Lot] for [Selected Item]. Please check the serial number(s) on [Selected Item].
Please select a serial number that is not already in use.  These serial numbers are already used in Quick Issue: [serial items]

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: References the location that inventory is being moved to (destination inventory location).

validation.validation: You cannot move goods from an owned stocking location into a consigned location. Enter a To Location that is owned.
validation.description: You cannot move goods from an owned stocking location into a consigned location. Enter a To Location that is owned.

validation.validation: Location [loc] is currently on hold.
Enter a 'To Location' that belongs to the Inventory Site specified in the header.
validation.description: Enter a 'To Location' that belongs to the Inventory Site specified in the header.

validation.validation: The To Inventory Location cannot be the same as the From Inventory Location.
validation.description: The To Inventory Location cannot be the same as the From Inventory Location.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: The quantity (in stocking unit of measure) of the inventory item being moved.

validation.validation: Quantity cannot be negative
The Quantity must convert into a valid whole number in Base UOM.
The Quantity must be a whole number for the UOM.
The To UOM does not allow decimals.  Enter a valid Quantity which converts to a whole number.
The 'From UOM' and the 'To UOM' do not convert to the same quantity in Base UOM.  [from uom] Quantity in Base UOM = [from base] [base uom], [to uom] Quantity in Base UOM = [to base] [base uom].
Invalid storage location referenced for [purchase item] [uom] [lot] in location [location].  Either a put away has not yet occurred or the entered data is invalid.
The Total Quantity to Move for the Item/Unit of Measure exceeds the Quantity Available to Move ([available]) in the From Location.

Inventory_Move_Detail_Data.description: Memo for the Inventory Move detail line.

Inventory_Move_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing Inventory Move Detail data.

validation.validation: Duplicate serial numbers are not allowed.
The quantity requested can't be moved. The moved quantity ([move qty] [base uom]) is greater than the quantity not yet reserved ([available qty] [base uom]). Change the move quantity or unreserve.
Location [loc] is currently on hold.
